basics.name: Gustavo A. Olivares Pino
basics.label: Scientist
basics.summary: Chemical Engineer turned atmospheric scientist, turned aerosol scientist.

work.name: NIWA - National Institute of Water and Atmospheric research
work.summary: Led the development of new technologies both in measurements and data analysis and visualisation. I have also been tasked with the data management of our group and with facilitating the participation of non-technical users in our research

work.name: Stockholm University - Department of Environmental Science
work.summary: eveloping a mobile measurement platform for ultrafine particles as well as studying the processes affecting aerosol behaviour in urban environments.

volunteer.summary: Managing early member lists, process and communications of the makerspace activities.

courses: PM and BC Emission Factors for Traffic and Domestic Wood Burning
